title: Trump calls for 'Due Process' amid staffers' allegations
text:
Trump calls for 'Due Process' amid staffers' allegations Saturday, February 10, 2018 - 01:43 
Donald Trump took to Twitter to warn against “false'' accusations after two of his staffers resigned over domestic abuse allegations. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Donald Trump took to Twitter to warn against “false" accusations after two of his staffers resigned over domestic abuse allegations. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2Eyz8TZ
